General.Name: Sungho Electronics Corp
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Sungho Electronics Corp. manufactures and sells electronic components in South Korea and internationally. It offers film capacitors for use in electric vehicles, 5G base stations, and green energy.; PCBAs, including display boards, main control boards, power boards, filter boards, inverter boards, and converter boards; power supply units for printers, LED lighting, PC's, and set-top box es; and LED Lighting products that illuminates comfortable and stable LED light in various environments. The company was formerly known as Jin Young Electronics Co., LTD. and changed its name to Sungho Electronics Corp. in February 2000. Sungho Electronics Corp. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
